animeDescription: When this beautiful detective duo takes on a new case involving drugs and rape, it brings back painful memories for Rio, whose sister was killed by a gang of sex-starved drug dealers. Could the same gang be responsible for this new threat? Hot-headed as she is, Rio must learn to control her anger in order to uncover the truth.(Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Megami Tantei -Vinus File-', 'Sequel: Shin-ban Megami Tantei Vinus File']
